text.text: The corpse of this boy looks like it's still crying out in pain.
This little girl's body is mangled and smashed, like someone stomped on her repeatedly.
This child's corpse has been mostly eaten by flies and other insects.
The young boy lying here has part of his skull caved in.
This girl's remains and mostly liquid at this point.
This departed child is still smiling for some reason. The sight is both spooky AND peaceful.
The body here is completely still. They must have been no more than 9 years old.
The corpse of this person looks horrendously mutilated and is curled up in fetal postiion. It has chunks bitten out of it and its fingers were stepped on.
This man's chest and mouth are completely covered in dry blood. The corpse's belly looks bloated and ready to pop.
This tall woman is still wearing some jewelry. Looking glamorous even in death.
The woman lying here looks like she tried her best. Her skin is bruised, scraped, and mangled. There's bloody flesh stuck under her fingernails.
This man is large and heavy, but his size didn't help him survive.
You hear the buzz of insects near this adult cadaver. There's a hole bored in its half-open eye with a maggot wiggling inside it. Your stomach curls.
Lifelessly this skinny corpse sits still. The pose is almost angelic and the body is clean. You wonder if your death will be so peaceful.
Just another body in a dead world.
The woman lying here still has a hint of beauty in death. Her hair is dyed in an ombre style.
This handsome fella has quite the mustache on his dead face. He even waxed it.
This person has intense look on their face, like they were ready for battle when they perished.
A young adult human corpse, maybe 18 years of age. They have a tattoo on whats visible on their leg.
Dead. Dead. Dead. Why is everyone dead. Where did this infection come from?
The corpse of this person looks a lot like someone you grew up with. Thinking back to home and your youth, you dream of better days.
They're dead. Maybe they have some loot nearby.
This man has a long, sharp nose, almost like a cartoon character.
Her face is covered in bruises and her body is lying crooked on the ground. You feel something for her.
A maggot crawls across this one's exposed flesh. Ugh. Who knows what's under the surface of the skin.
An average sized man with dark skin. He has beads woven into his hair. He is very, very dead.
A gunshot wound rests in this one's chest. There's no exit wound so the bullet probably shredded their lungs or something. Maybe it's lodged in the spine. You're almost jealous of the quick death.
This woman in in her 40s maybe. She has a soft, motherly expression on her dead face.
The eyes of this corpse are missing. There's scratches and bite marks all over the face.
This man's thick stubble on his chin gives him an expression like he's tired and want's to go home from work. Maybe he's in a better place now.
The body of this person has brightly dyed hair and a pouting expression.
